story.book

Class FragmentCreationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.LocalEditingController
      • story.book.FragmentCreationController

  • public class FragmentCreationController
extends LocalEditingController
    Controller responsible for adding and removing Illustration objects of a StoryFragment object for the StoryFragmentEditActivity.
    Author:
    Alexander Cheung
    See Also:
    Illustration, TextIllustration, StoryFragment, LocalEditingController
